title: Inbound SMS Campaigns
body:
Inbound SMS Campaigns¶

Inbound messaging starts with an individual sending a trigger term to a program’s number.
This will enroll them in the SMS campaign’s workflow.
If this individual has an unknown phone number (meaning it is not associated with any contact in the Maha Platform), the Caller Identification service will search for a name to create a new contact.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Campaigns

  3. Click Inbound SMS

  4. Click to create a new inbound SMS campaign

  5. Click on an inbound SMS campaign to view details, an audit trail, comments, emails, and performance

  6. Click and Deactivate Campaign or Activate Campaign to change the status of the campaign

  7. Click click Delete Campaign then Yes to delete the campaign along with all associated workflows and performance data

#. Click Design Workflow to design your inbound SMS campaign #.
